abstract: David Waldstreicher reviews book Valiant Ambition: George Washington, Benedict Arnold and the Fate of the American Revolution by Nathaniel Philbrick.
lead_paragraph: A history of the Revolutionary War offers a complex portrait of Benedict Arnold.
snippet: A history of the Revolutionary War offers a complex portrait of Benedict Arnold.
